text: Lɨca 15.24 Sng 22.18 sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ kɨlɨ cɨgaŋ kɨlikua lama ifɨci uu hɨvɨ Jisasɨ dɨ lama haneŋ hɨvɨ ifɨhɨlɨpavɨci umalɨ. Ifɨhɨlɨpavɨci uci mɨŋaiaka lalɨlamavɨmalɨ. Lɨca nudɨ hadi kɨlakɨla agɨladɨ vihavɨmalɨ. Vica ani ani vibalɨhavi aba kɨlɨ kɨlɨsɨ salaŋ iakuavɨmalɨ.Kɨlɨ cɨgaŋ kɨlikua lama ifɨci uu hɨvɨ Jisasɨ dɨ lama haneŋ hɨvɨ ifɨhɨlɨpavɨci umalɨ.
